name: Short Fuse: Company Time
description:
So, maybe the AI have gone too far this time... Now there's nothing left to do except play games all day! Maybe your coworkers are up to something interesting?

How To Play

Get to the end of the stage within the time limit!

Change the camera view with the scroll wheel.

Turn on the monitor by left clicking on the power button.

Move Left/Right with A/D or Arrow Left/Right.

Jump with Space

Credits

Created in one week! This is the 8th project for GSAS-4510 | Experimental Game Design.
